org.xflatdb.xflat.util

Class DocumentFileWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.util.DocumentFileWrapper

  • public class DocumentFileWrapper
extends Object
    Provides a simple abstraction around File for reading and writing JDOM Document documents.
    Author:
    gordon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentFileWrapper(File file)
      Creates a new DocumentFileWrapper that wraps the given file, using the default SAXBuilder and XMLOutputter.
      DocumentFileWrapper(File file, org.jdom2.input.SAXBuilder builder, org.jdom2.output.XMLOutputter outputter)
      Creates a new DocumentFileWrapper wrapping the given file, using the given SAXBuilder and XMLOutputter to read and write the file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean exists()
      A passthrough for File.exists().
      org.jdom2.Document readFile()
      Reads a JDOM Document out of the wrapped file.
      org.jdom2.Document readFile(String fileName)
      Reads a JDOM document out of the named file, which is in the directory wrapped by this wrapper.
      String toString() 
      void writeFile(org.jdom2.Document doc)
      Writes a JDOM document to the wrapped file.
      void writeFile(String fileName, org.jdom2.Document doc)
      Writes a JDOM document to the named file, which is in the directory wrapped by this wrapper.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentFileWrapper

        public DocumentFileWrapper(File file)
        Creates a new DocumentFileWrapper that wraps the given file, using the default SAXBuilder and XMLOutputter.
        Parameters:
        file -

      • DocumentFileWrapper

        public DocumentFileWrapper(File file,
                   org.jdom2.input.SAXBuilder builder,
                   org.jdom2.output.XMLOutputter outputter)
        Creates a new DocumentFileWrapper wrapping the given file, using the given SAXBuilder and XMLOutputter to read and write the file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file wrapped by this wrapper.
        builder - The builder used to build documents from the FileInputStream.
        outputter - The outputter that formats documents for output to the FileOutputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        A passthrough for File.exists().
        Returns:
        true if the wrapped file exists.

      • readFile

        public org.jdom2.Document readFile()
                            throws IOException,
                                   org.jdom2.JDOMException
        Reads a JDOM Document out of the wrapped file.
        Returns:
        The Document parsed from the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurred while reading the file.
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - if the data in the file was not valid XML

      • readFile

        public org.jdom2.Document readFile(String fileName)
                            throws IOException,
                                   org.jdom2.JDOMException
        Reads a JDOM document out of the named file, which is in the directory wrapped by this wrapper.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file in the directory wrapped by this wrapper.
        Returns:
        The Document parsed from the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurred while reading the file.
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - if the data in the file was not valid XML

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(org.jdom2.Document doc)
               throws IOException
        Writes a JDOM document to the wrapped file.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document to output to the wrapped file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurred while writing the file.

      • writeFile

        public void writeFile(String fileName,
             org.jdom2.Document doc)
               throws IOException
        Writes a JDOM document to the named file, which is in the directory wrapped by this wrapper.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file in the directory wrapped by this wrapper.
        doc - The document to output to the wrapped file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurred while writing the file.
